td.p: Block 1, of mass m1, is connected over an ideal (massless and frictionless) pulley to block 2, of mass m2, as shown. Assume that the blocks accelerate as shown with an acceleration of magnitude a and that the coefficient of kinetic friction between block 2 and the plane is \( \mu \).
Find the ratio of the masses \( m_1 / m_2 \).

problem.p: How do you classify this problem in your mind? Write a word or short phrase in each box below. Please put the response with the greatest descriptive power to you in the top box.

stringresponse.answer: It's a survey. There is no right answer!
